prompt:
Use case: social ad
Primary request: A premium 12-second investor/influencer-style teaser for an AI-powered personal website platform.
Scene/background: Dark cinematic digital studio with floating UI panels and code blocks, no people.
Subject: Abstract product interface elements: blog cards, multilingual audio controls (EN/HI/TA), semantic search results panel, and a 3D science visualization widget.
Action: beat 1 (0-4s) portfolio grid transforms into a live product dashboard; beat 2 (4-8s) audio controls and semantic search animate with highlighted results; beat 3 (8-12s) 3D science visual rotates and resolves to a bold end card.
Camera: smooth dolly-in with subtle parallax, stable framing.
Lighting/mood: confident, premium, high-contrast tech launch vibe.
Color palette: graphite, electric blue, cyan, white.
Style/format: clean modern product trailer, motion graphics focused.
Text (verbatim): "Not a portfolio. A content operating system.", "OpenAI-powered blog audio", "Semantic search", "Try it now -> kumar2net.com/blog"
Audio: subtle cinematic pulse, no vocals.
Constraints: no real people, no logos, text must stay legible.
Avoid: flicker, jitter, unreadable text, watermark artifacts.
